title: T206 Sale ++ Graded HOF + Cobb + Young + Matty + Etc
author: mybuddyinc

posts.post_title: T206 Sale ++ Graded HOF + Cobb + Young + Matty + Etc
posts.post_content:
***** PLEASE ***** Correspondence ONLY to -- [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

A few things, so I can keep this as organized as possible:

1 -- I will address all correspondences in the order of date/time delivery into my email box.
2 -- Please Note:  I work evenings/nights, and keep somewhat odd hours. Therefore response time may vary depending when I am on the computer. However, all correspondences will be addressed.
3 -- “I’ll take it” will take precedent over ongoing correspondences.
4 – Payment:  Paypal gift preferred; Paypal goods please add 3%.  Check/MO fine.
5 – Free S/H
6 –  Satisfaction guaranteed.


[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=380054&d=1578420521[/IMG]
Cobb, red portrait, PSA 2 (SC 350-460 / 25, for those who care ;)) – traded
Cobb, bat on, SGC 1 – sold
